subject: Steroids
Athletics and Sports
Doping (Sports)
Football
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The suspensions of professional baseball and football players for testing positive for steroids after taking an over-the-counter weight-loss drug have raised new questions for sports leagues.
snippet: The suspensions of professional baseball and football players for testing positive for steroids after taking an over-the-counter weight-loss drug have raised new questions for sports leagues.
